bibl.title: Finding Persephone. Women's Rituals in the Ancient Mediterranean
bibl.note: Paper read at a conference held October 4-5, 2002, at the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign. - La matrice errante dans le corps de la femme: le point de vue des médecins anciens et celui des exorcistes (d'après les papyrus de magie et les amulettes).
bibl.seg: FARAONE Christopher A, The Rise of the Demon Womb in Greco-Roman Antiquity.

Maryline PARCA and Angeliki TZANETOU (Edd.), Finding Persephone. Women's Rituals in the Ancient Mediterranean = Studies in Ancient Folklore and Popular Culture (Bloomington - Indianapolis, 2007) pp. 154-164, 1 tabl.
